response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds significant value to us at $15,000. Given its importance and the benefits it offers to you, I propose a fair price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and what you perceive its worth to be. I believe this price is both reasonable and advantageous for both parties. Should you have any concerns or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 12000}
